edu.cnm.deepdive.nasaapod.model

Class ApodDB.Converters

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.nasaapod.model.ApodDB.Converters
  • Enclosing class:
    ApodDB

    public static class ApodDB.Converters
extends Object
    Supports conversion operations for persistence of relevant types not natively supported by Room/SQLite.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Converters() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Calendar calendarFromLong(Long milliseconds)
      Converts a Long value containing the number of milliseconds since the start of the Unix epoch (1970-01-01 00:00:00.000 UTC) to an instance of Calendar, and returns the latter.
      static edu.cnm.deepdive.util.Date dateFromInt(Integer days)
      Converts an Integer value containing the days since the start of the Unix epoch (1970-01-01) to an instance of Date, and returns the latter.
      static Integer intFromDate(edu.cnm.deepdive.util.Date date)
      Converts a Date local date value to a number of days since the start of the Unix epoch (1970-01-01), and returns the latter.
      static Long longFromCalendar(Calendar calendar)
      Converts a Calendar date-time value number of milliseconds since the start of the Unix epoch (1970-01-01 00:00:00.000 UTC), and returns the latter.

    • Method Detail

      • calendarFromLong

        @Nullable
public static Calendar calendarFromLong(@Nullable
                                                   Long milliseconds)
        Converts a Long value containing the number of milliseconds since the start of the Unix epoch (1970-01-01 00:00:00.000 UTC) to an instance of Calendar, and returns the latter.
        Parameters:
        milliseconds - date-time as a number of milliseconds since the start of the Unix epoch.
        Returns:
        date-time as a Calendar instance.

      • longFromCalendar

        @Nullable
public static Long longFromCalendar(@Nullable
                                               Calendar calendar)
        Converts a Calendar date-time value number of milliseconds since the start of the Unix epoch (1970-01-01 00:00:00.000 UTC), and returns the latter.
        Parameters:
        calendar - date-time as a Calendar instance.
        Returns:
        date-time as a number of milliseconds since the start of the Unix epoch.

      • dateFromInt

        @Nullable
public static edu.cnm.deepdive.util.Date dateFromInt(@Nullable
                                                                Integer days)
        Converts an Integer value containing the days since the start of the Unix epoch (1970-01-01) to an instance of Date, and returns the latter. Both of these are interpreted as local dates, with no reference to time zone.
        Parameters:
        days - local date as a number of days since the start of the Unix epoch.
        Returns:
        local date as a Date instance.

      • intFromDate

        @Nullable
public static Integer intFromDate(@Nullable
                                             edu.cnm.deepdive.util.Date date)
        Converts a Date local date value to a number of days since the start of the Unix epoch (1970-01-01), and returns the latter. Both of these are interpreted as local dates, with no reference to time zone.
        Parameters:
        date - local date as a Date instance.
        Returns:
        local date as a number of days since the start of the Unix epoch.
